meanings.definition: Born before the full term of gestation.
meanings.sent1: The preterm baby needed extra care in the hospital.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that a preterm birth can happen unexpectedly.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a preterm arrival for the pizza delivery guy!
meanings.sent4: Her preterm departure from the meeting left everyone surprised.
meanings.sent5: The preterm blossoming of the flowers in winter was a rare sight.

meanings.sent1: The preterm rain caught us off guard during the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The preterm announcement of the test results caused anxiety among the students.
meanings.sent3: The preterm start of the movie made everyone laugh at the mix-up.
meanings.sent4: His preterm decision to leave the party early puzzled his friends.
meanings.sent5: The preterm arrival of the bus saved her from being late to work.
